greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum_{k>=1} phi(k) * x^k/(1 - x^k)^3, where phi = Euler totient function (A000010).
comment: Dirichlet convolution of Euler totient function with triangular numbers.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} gcd(n,k)*(gcd(n,k)+1)/2. - _Richard L. Ollerton_, May 07 2021
mathematica: nmax = 55; CoefficientList[Series[Sum[EulerPhi[k] x^k/(1 - x^k)^3, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] // Rest
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jul 23 2019
